        public void chatClicked()
                 throws java.io.IOException,
                        java.sql.SQLException

      • wikipedia

        public java.lang.String wikipedia(java.lang.String object)
                           throws java.io.IOException
        Function activated by function chatClicked()

        This function gathers information from wikipedia on a given topic.

        Parameters:
        object - The object that the user searched for
        Returns:
        Returns the first sentence from the wikipedia article of the given object
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
